item.title: RAG and Streamlit Chatbot: Chat with Documents Using LLM
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction This article aims to create an AI-powered RAG and Streamlit chatbot that can answer users questions based on custom documents. Users can upload documents, and the chatbot can answer questions by referring to those documents. The interface will be generated using Streamlit, and the chatbot will use open-source Large Language Model (LLM) models, making […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction This article aims to create an AI-powered RAG and Streamlit chatbot that can answer users questions based on custom documents. Users can upload documents, and the chatbot can answer questions by referring to those documents. The interface will be generated using Streamlit, and the chatbot will use open-source Large Language Model (LLM) models, making […]

The post RAG and Streamlit Chatbot: Chat with Documents Using LLM appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: How to Transition your Career from Non Tech Field to Generative AI?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In today’s rapidly evolving world, the term ‘Generative AI’ is on everyone’s lips. Studies reveal that Generative AI is becoming indispensable in the workplace, with the market projected to reach $1.3 trillion by 2032. If you’ve been considering a career transition from a non-tech field to Generative AI, now is the time! This article explores the […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction In today’s rapidly evolving world, the term ‘Generative AI’ is on everyone’s lips. Studies reveal that Generative AI is becoming indispensable in the workplace, with the market projected to reach $1.3 trillion by 2032. If you’ve been considering a career transition from a non-tech field to Generative AI, now is the time! This article explores the […]

The post How to Transition your Career from Non Tech Field to Generative AI? appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Microsoft Phi 3 Mini: The Tiny Model That Runs on Your Phone
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In the field of artificial intelligence (AI), there’s always been a belief that bigger is better. But Microsoft has just shaken things up with their latest creation, Phi-3-mini. It’s a small AI model that’s turning heads by showing that size isn’t everything. Despite being much smaller than its counterparts, Phi-3-mini can hold its own […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction In the field of artificial intelligence (AI), there’s always been a belief that bigger is better. But Microsoft has just shaken things up with their latest creation, Phi-3-mini. It’s a small AI model that’s turning heads by showing that size isn’t everything. Despite being much smaller than its counterparts, Phi-3-mini can hold its own […]
